coref_content: the disease of addiction be a beast, and the beast want to be feed. addiction be a disease that encompass anything that an individual be obsessively and compulsively participate in on a daily basis. an individual may be addict to the internet, pornography, food, gambling, video game, sex, self - injury, or most commonly associate with the word addiction, drug and alcohol. in the fast - pace world, individual be use vice every day to cope with stress, and escape individual be's reality. here be some sign of addiction : focus constantly on obtain more, at all cost no matter which mean you have to use to have to acquire more. put your addiction before your family and other love one. lose job because of your addiction. when your life have become merely nothing more than live to fulfill the demand of your addiction, result in your life be control by your addiction. isolate yourself from the outside world in order to use your vice. intense change in mood as a result of your addiction : agitation, hostility, and self - center thinking be common change. when participate in your addiction no long make you feel good, but now make you feel numb. the inability to deal with reality, therefore, constantly retreat to your addiction. justify your using : I need the drug so I do not get sick. rationalize your behavior : I do not have a problem, I can have just one, and in fact I can stop at any time. the disease of addiction be a beast, and the beast want to be feed. the ever powerful and driving force of addiction threaten the addict livelihood. addiction will bring you down and addiction do not care whose life addiction take with addiction. when addict, you be no long thrive, but be barely survive, grip to compulsive behavior to balance out stressor and avoid the rest of the world. addiction be like a great escape act : in the way that addict isolate addict, escape from participate with other, and escape from life as a whole, thus dive into a deep dark hole with no conceivable way out. many addict go unaware that many addict have a problem, and some know some have a problem but have become so beat down by some's addiction that some do not possess the strength to pull some out of the hole. in be bury in addiction, addict often feel trapped. the sickness of addiction persist when an addict trade one addiction for another. trade come from constantly seek something to fill a void. instead of forever fill a void with substance or outside source, an addict could replace those self - seek behavior with a recovery plan. therapy, treatment center, and 12 - step group could facilitate an inner peace. if you identify with any of these emotion or behavior, you be an addict ; but the good news be that there be help. in embrace the title of addict you be admit that you have a disease, and therefore, can peruse help. in know what you be, you know what you must do, and there be great freedom in that. distribute by Client Initiatives Media Contact Company name : Elite Rehab Placement Contact person : Thomas email : phone : 844 - 707 - 5678 address : 903 Calle Amanecer, Suite 240 city : San Clemente State : CA country : United States website :
